constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LOCIND Name: Locally Significant Industrial Site
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required by Condition 33 (Drainage Design) of planning permission 18/14633/FUL (Demolition of the existing building and redevelopment of the site to provide 37 residential units in a part 5 and part 7 storey building with associated plant, car parking and landscaping).
decision_conditions: The details submitted for the condition 33 (Drainage Design) of planning permission 18/14633/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this condition is hereby fully discharged.

Should the access into the site during construction not be paved, spoil could be carried from the site onto the public highway. The access into the site should be paved to minimise the carryover of spoil onto adjacent roads.We would also require the applicant to sweep and wash down the adjacent roads to ensure that the public highway is kept clear of debris. This is to ensure a satisfactory road surface for road safety reasons at all times.

For clarity and for consultation, kindly submit only the originally approved drawings to which the changes relate to and also then the proposed drawings which show the changes to be made. We would ask that you do not submit the full pack of 15 drawings each time
